asyncapi.description: The AsyncAPI specification version of this document.

id.description: A unique id representing the application.

http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/sp.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

title.description: A unique and precise title of the API.

version.description: A semantic version number of the API.

description.description: A longer description of the API. Should be different from the title. CommonMark is allowed.

termsOfService.description: A URL to the Terms of Service for the API. MUST be in the format of a URL.

http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/co.description: Contact information for the owners of the API.

name.description: The identifying name of the contact person/organization.

url.description: The URL pointing to the contact information.

email.description: The email address of the contact person/organization.

name.description: The name of the license type. It's encouraged to use an OSI compatible license.

url.description: The URL pointing to the license.

http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/se.description: An object representing a Server Variable for server URL template substitution.

http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/pa.description: JSON objects describing re-usable channel parameters.

description.description: A brief description of the parameter. This could contain examples of use. GitHub Flavored Markdown is allowed.

location.description: A runtime expression that specifies the location of the parameter value

summary.description: A brief summary of the message.

title.description: A human-friendly title for the message.

description.description: A longer description of the message. CommonMark is allowed.
A optional description of the correlation ID. GitHub Flavored Markdown is allowed.

location.description: A runtime expression that specifies the location of the correlation ID

summary.description: A brief summary of the message.

title.description: A human-friendly title for the message.

description.description: A longer description of the message. CommonMark is allowed.

primitiveTypeWithMetadata.title: Primitive Type With Metadata
primitiveTypeWithMetadata.description: A primitive type with metadata attached.

avroFixed.title: Fixed
avroFixed.description: A fixed sized array of bytes

http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/av.description: Json-Schema definition for Avro AVSC files.
http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/av.title: Avro Schema Definition

http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/co.description: An object to hold a set of reusable objects for different aspects of the AsyncAPI Specification.

http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/sc.description: JSON objects describing schemas the API uses.

http://asyncapi.com/definitions/2.0.0/me.description: JSON objects describing the messages being consumed and produced by the API.
